snippet.title: Shikon-X Astro Defense Fortress Trailer 2
snippet.description:
You can play Shikon-X's free demo on Steam right now! (Available in English, Español and 日本語)
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1298270/ShikonX_Astro_Defense_Fortress/
Make sure to wishlist and share it, so all adventure gamers can find it!

Shikon-X is a space Point & Click Adventure game where you play as Major Daaia, the best pilot in the Federation. During a routine defense operation, you receive a mysterious transmission from the attackers, which kick-starts an epic intergalactic (and funny) quest to uncover the truth about the war, and your place in it.

You've never played an adventure game like this before! 
Shikon-X features streamlined controls: you only have one inventory and one interaction button, no verbs and no pixel hunting, just interact with the environment and characters, and don't worry about anything else.

There are also a lot of arcade-style mini-games to enjoy along the way.

Wishlist Shikon-X now! The galaxy needs you!
